Reviews.Title: Have always liked dell
Reviews.Author: JAMIE HEMPHILL
Reviews.Content: Great computer for the price. I felt very comfortable with my purchase through amazon and without a doubt shop again.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Pentium Dual Core Processor T4500 (2.3Ghz, 800Mhz, 1MB)
4GB Shared Dual Channel DDR3 at 1333MHz; 500GB 5400rpm HD
WLED Bent-Type, HD resolution (1366x768), TrueLife; Intel Graphics Media Accelerator X4500HD
6-Cell Lithium Ion Primary Battery; Integrated 0.3MP Webcam; Built-in wireless capability
Genuine Windows 7 Home Premium, 64bit
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron 15 Notebook (Inspiron N5030) 3D Black / 4GB DDR3 / 500GB HD / Webcam / Windows 7
